article_title: Here's One Reason Why Obamacare Premiums Could Spike Next Year
article_text:

twitter.description: Companies selling individual health plans on Obamacare’s insurance marketplaces must grapple with the impending expiration of two of the law’s key early-stage programs, likely foretelli...

article_metadata.description: Two out of three key Obamacare provisions meant to stabilize insurance marketplaces and premiums in the law's nascent years are expiring.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Here’s One Reason Why Obamacare Premiums Could Spike Next Year
